message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of Hidden Markov Models (HMM) for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in Indian languages. This falls under the sub-category of Natural Language Processing (NLP), which is typically classified under cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the use of statistical models such as HMM can also be classified under sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the evaluation of the system, which can be classified under sub-categories such as cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
